sentences.english: The Boskops coexisted with our Homo sapiens forebears.
sentences.chinese: 博斯科普人曾与我们的智人祖先和平共处。

sentences.english: But the wheel is one hundred percent homo sapien innovation.
sentences.chinese: 但轮子却百分百属于智人的发明。

sentences.english: Our ancestors from pre-Homo Sapiens times seem to have given fire a ritual significance.
sentences.chinese: 前智人时期的祖先似乎把火作为一种宗教象征。

sentences.english: Ursus was a man, Homo a wolf.
sentences.chinese: 厄休斯是一个人，智人狼。

sentences.english: Either way, Neandertals and H. sapiens had much in common.
sentences.chinese: 不管哪种，尼安德特人和智人具有许多共同点。

sentences.english: Idiot when your teacher can mentally retarded people can teach you to say the words .
sentences.chinese: 白痴当你的老师能弱智人可以教你说的话。

sentences.english: This is the oldest complete Homo sapiens mtDNA genome generated to date.
sentences.chinese: 这是最古老的智人线粒体基因组产生的日期。

sentences.english: Jinniushan archaic Homo sapiens has nearly complete maxillary dentition.
sentences.chinese: 金牛山古智人化石有近完整之上颌牙列。

sentences.english: Without these certainties, Homo sapiens would still be living in caves.
sentences.chinese: 没有这些确定性，智人会依然生活在洞穴中。

sentences.english: The cranial capacity of Neandertals was about as large as ours.
sentences.chinese: 尼安德特人的脑容量和智人相差不多。

sentences.english: Ursus and Homo were fast friends.
sentences.chinese: 厄休斯和智人是忠实的朋友。

definition: ancient hominid species such as Homo erectus, Neanderthal man etc
Neanderthal (abbr. for 尼安德特人[Ni2 an1 de2 te4 ren2])
Pleistocene (geological epoch from 2m years ago, covering the most recent ice ages)
